name: Product.SubscriptionOffer.PaymentMode
desc: The payment modes for subscription offers.

items.name: static let freeTrial: Product.SubscriptionOffer.PaymentMode
items.desc: A payment mode of a product discount that indicates a free trial offer.

items.name: static let payAsYouGo: Product.SubscriptionOffer.PaymentMode
items.desc: A payment mode of a product discount that indicates the discount applies over a single or multiple billing periods.

items.name: static let payUpFront: Product.SubscriptionOffer.PaymentMode
items.desc: A payment mode of a product discount that indicates the discount is paid up front.

items.name: static func != (Product.SubscriptionOffer.PaymentMode, Product.SubscriptionOffer.PaymentMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.
